tasks.task: Understanding and applying various irrigation methods
subtasks: Identifying different irrigation methods such as surface (basin, border, furrow, check flooding), subsurface, drip, and sprinkler
Implementing surface irrigation techniques, including land contouring, building embankments, and managing water flow
Setting up and maintaining drip irrigation systems, involving laying pipes and nozzles
Operating sprinkler systems for crops on steep slopes or prone to erosion
Designing irrigation plans considering factors like soil type, groundwater levels, and rainfall
Managing water efficiently by preventing over-irrigation and ensuring uniform water distribution
